segments.text: Would you tell me how I should send this parcel to Shanghai , China ? It contains only books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might send it as'Printed Matter ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if I could have it insured here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . How much would you want to insure these books for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see ... I think I can have them insured for five hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Five hundred dollars , so you pay ten dollars for the insurance , that's two percent of the total value of the article .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's a check for ten dollars .
segments.speaker: S1
